verbs.description: [ARGM-ADV: Just] [V: wait] [ARGM-TMP: until McDonald ’s hears about this] ! —MLK daughter claps back at Steve Bannon for saying her father would be proud of Trump— Wendy ’s , the fast food chain behind some epic online clap - backs , is serving up more than just beef after employees posted a video of a mouse scurrying around their hamburger burger buns . …
